articles.title: Klay Thompson's Game 6-sealing 3-pointer vs. Grizzlies gave Steve Kerr chills - NBC Sports
articles.description: Steve Kerr had the same reaction as everyone in Dub Nation watching Klay Thompson hit the dagger 3-pointer against the Grizzlies.
articles.content:
The moment will be etched into the minds of Warriors fans forever.

articles.title: NCAA softball: BYU will miss Big Dance, while Weber State faces Texas - Deseret News
articles.description: BYU went 42-10 and tied LMU for the WCC championship, but the Lions got the league’s automatic bid into the Big Dance and the Cougars will miss the tourney for the first time since 2004
articles.content:
Despite winning a piece of the West Coast Conference title on Saturday, the BYU softball team will not be playing in the NCAA Softball Championships this year.
The Cougars (42-10) were hoping to get… [+2112 chars]
